# ----- Earnings-to-Price factor ---------------------------------
# inputs: df, subindustry, helper fns from operations.py already imported

eps = ts_backfill(df["income_eps"])
earnings_yield = eps / df["close"]

cap = df["cap"]
size_bucket = bucket(cs_rank(cap), bin_range=(0.2, 1.0, 0.1))

alpha = group_neutralize(
            group_rank_normalized(earnings_yield, subindustry),
            size_bucket)

custom_feature = cs_winsor(alpha, limits=(0.02, 0.98)).rename("custom_feature")
